channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 19:52 ATTENTION !!! Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Zaporizhia region- Polohivskyi district
item.description: 🟡 19:52 ATTENTION !!! Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Zaporizhia region- Polohivskyi district#Molochansk_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
